aircraft.value: Mantis Recon - AC-5982-448 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Ballistics computer calculation error. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Ammunition Feed component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 25/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 28/04/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 30/04/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 30/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 03/05/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
